languages.text: {n}Маражай морщится.{/n} "Твое вед... твой корабль — лишь маленькая скорлупка во вселенной возможностей, открытой моим талантам. Пускай Опустошительной буре положен конец — я могу найти ей замену. Не в Комморре, так в других темных углах этого сектора. Сслиты, корсары, мон-кай — мало ли тех, кто жаждет преклонить колено перед тем, кто знает каноны войны и заповеди бойни?"

{n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector. Sslyth, corsairs, mon-keigh — there are many who long to bend the knee to one who knows the canons of war and the tenets of slaughter."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай морщится.{/n} "Твое вед... твой корабль — лишь маленькая скорлупка во вселенной возможностей, открытой моим талантам. languages.text: {n}マラズハイの唇がゆがむ。{/n}「お前のボート―お前の船は、俺の才能に開かれた可能性の宇宙の中の小さな貝殻でしかない。略奪の嵐はなくなったが、いくらでも代わりは見つけられる。コモラフじゃなく、この星域の暗い隅にいけばいくらでもあるさ。ススリス、コルセア、モン＝ケイ…戦争のルールと殺戮の信条を知る者を欲する者はいくらでもいるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector. Sslyth, corsairs, mon-keigh — there are many who long to bend the knee to one who knows the canons of war and the tenets of slaughter."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋扬起嘴角。{/n}“你的小破——你的飞船对我而言，不过是我大展拳脚的无限可能中的一鳞半爪。尽管狂风阴谋团已经不复存在，但我仍有许多选择。不是在科摩罗，而是在这片区域的其他黑暗的角落。蛇人、海盗、猴子——我懂得战争与杀戮的法则，多的是人渴望跪倒在我的面前。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector. Sslyth, corsairs, mon-keigh — there are many who long to bend the knee to one who knows the canons of war and the tenets of slaughter."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋扬起嘴角。{/n}“你的小破——你的飞船对我而言，不过是我大展拳脚的无限可能中的一鳞半爪。尽管狂风阴谋团已经不复存在，但我仍有许多选择。不是在科摩罗，而是在这片区域的其他黑暗的角落。西里斯、海盗、猴子——我懂得战争与杀戮的法则，多的是人渴望跪倒在我的面前。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Lippen kräuseln sich.{/n} "Euer Schiff ist nur eine winzige Muschel im Universum der Möglichkeiten, die meinen Talenten offenstehen. Auch wenn der plündernde Sturm geendet hat, kann ich einen Ersatz dafür finden. Nicht in Commorragh, doch in den anderen dunklen Winkeln dieses Sektors. Sslyth, Korsaren, Chem-Pan-Sey — es gibt viele, die vor jemandem in die Knie gehen, der den Kanon des Krieges und die Gesetze des Gemetzels kennt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector. Sslyth, corsairs, mon-keigh — there are many who long to bend the knee to one who knows the canons of war and the tenets of slaughter."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai tuerce el labio.{/n} «Esta bañe... nave no es más que un cascarón diminuto en un universo de posibilidades que se abren ante mis talentos. Aunque la Tempestad Asoladora haya dejado de existir, puedo encontrar una alternativa. No en Commorragh, sino en los otros rincones oscuros de este sector. Sslyth, corsarios, mon-keigh... hay muchos dispuestos a servir a alguien que conoce los cánones de la guerra y los mandamientos de la masacre».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector. Sslyth, corsairs, mon-keigh — there are many who long to bend the knee to one who knows the canons of war and the tenets of slaughter."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait la moue.{/n} « Votre vaisseau n'est qu'une minuscule coquille dans l'univers des possibilités ouvertes à mes talents. Bien que la Tempête ravageuse a pris fin, je peux trouver de quoi la remplacer. Pas à Commorragh, mais dans d'autres recoins obscurs de ce secteur. Sslyths, corsaires, mon-keigh... Nombreux sont ceux qui aspirent à suivre quelqu'un qui connaît les canons de la guerre et les préceptes du massacre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector. Sslyth, corsairs, mon-keigh — there are many who long to bend the knee to one who knows the canons of war and the tenets of slaughter."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Senin tenek... Senin gemin; yeteneklerimi sergilememi bekleyen, sonsuz ihtimaller sunan evrendeki küçük bir kutu yalnızca. Müfteris Kasırga'nın sonu gelmiş olsa da onun yerine başka bir şey bulabilirim. Commorragh'ta değil de bu sektörün diğer karanlık köşelerinde. Sslyth, korsan gemileri, mon-keighler... Savaş nizamnamesini ve katliam ilkelerini iyi bilen birine diz çökme arzusunda olan çok fazla kişi var."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lip curls.{/n} "Your buck— your ship is but a tiny shell in the universe of possibilities that is open to my talents. Though the Reaving Tempest has ended, I can find a replacement for it. Not in Commorragh, but in the other dark corners of this sector.
